Class MavPark

  • java.lang.Object
    • MavPark
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Proj3Constants

    public class MavPark
extends java.lang.Object
implements Proj3Constants
    MavPark class to be used by MavParkTest class for testing and running the program

      • createEmployee

        public void createEmployee(java.lang.String empType,
                  java.lang.String firstName,
                  java.lang.String lastName,
                  java.lang.String gender,
                  Date dateOfBirth,
                  Date hireDate,
                  double monthlySalary,
                  double value)
        creates an employee object using polymorphism(monitor/collector/maintainer)
        Parameters:
        empType - is the type of the employee(must be one of MNTR/MAINT/COLL)
        firstName - is the first name of the employee
        lastName - is the last name of the employee
        gender - is the gender of the employee
        dateOfBirth - is the date of birth of the employee
        hireDate - is the hire date of the employee
        monthlySalary - is the monthly base salary in dollars and cents of the employee

      • createParkingLot

        public void createParkingLot(java.lang.String lotName,
                    int lotNumber,
                    java.lang.String lotLocation,
                    int totalSpaces,
                    int reservedSpaces,
                    java.lang.String lotType,
                    double lotCost)
        creates a parking lot object of type Regular or Metered using polymorphism
        Parameters:
        lotName - is the name of the lot
        lotNumber - is the lot number
        lotLocation - is the location of the parking lot
        totalSpaces - is the total space capacity of the parking lot
        reservedSpaces - is the total reserved spaces in the parking lot
        lotType - is the type of the lot(Regular/Metered)
        lotCost - is the cost of parking at this parking lot

        parkingTag - is the vehicle tag number

      • displayParkingInfo

        public void displayParkingInfo(int lotNumber,
                      Date parkingDate,
                      java.lang.String parkingTag,
                      int meterNumber,
                      java.lang.String startTime,
                      java.lang.String endTime,
                      double meterAmount)
        implements the menu number 11 of the project description accepts parking information for metered parking lot
        Parameters:
        lotNumber - is the parking lot number
        parkingDate - is the parking date
        parkingTag - is the vehicle tag number
        meterNumber - is the meter number for parking
        startTime - is the meter start time
        endTime - is the meter end time
        meterAmount - is the amount charged per hour parking

                     double ticketAmount)
        implements menu12 for parking ticket issued at a regular parking lot accepts ticket information for a regular parking lot
        Parameters:
        ticketLotNumber - is the lot number where the ticket was issued
        ticketDate - is the date when the ticket was issued
        carTag - is the vehicle tag to which the ticket was issued
        ticketTime - is the time when the ticket was issued
        ticketAmount - is the amount of the ticket issued
